name: Amnesiac (MemoryWorks)
description:
~Story~

You wake up in a small forest clearing without any of your memories. Fortunately, your not alone as you still have the narrator to talk to.  Not to worry! Apparently, there is a mysterious herb deep in the forest that can restore your memories. With the help of your partner, you can recover your memories. Then everything can go back to normal. Right?

~Features~

- Multiple choices that matter
- 5 different endings
- A turn-based battle system
- 1 ending will take about 1 hour

~Controls~

- Arrow Keys - Movement
- Z/Enter - Actions
- X/Esc - Cancel and Menu
- Shift - Run (Only in certain areas)

~Credits~

More Details in Game Credits

Plugins:

Yanfly: http://www.yanfly.moe/wiki/Category:Yanfly_Engine_Plugins

SRDude: http://sumrndm.site/

Music:  

Eric Matyas: https://soundimage.org/ 

~Other~

If you have time please fill out a survey to let me know how well you liked the game! 

If you are struggling or need help I've made a spoiler-free guide to the game and its mechanics. If you are using Google Docs just click on the little symbol on the left to view an outline.
